mapper.insert: insert into desk (desk_number, member_number, desk_store_number, desk_people) values (#{deskNumber}, #{memberNumber}, #{deskStoreNumber}, #{deskPeople})
mapper.update: update desk set desk_people = #{deskPeople}} where member_number = #{memberNumber} and desk_store_number = #{deskStoreNumber}
mapper.delete: delete from desk where member_number = #{memberNumber} and desk_store_number = #{deskStoreNumber}
